API.BALANCE_TOO_LOW_DETAIL: Not enough {{ token }} on your account! The transaction costs are: {{ totalAmount }} ({{ amount }} + {{ fee }} fee). However your account balance is only {{ balance }}!
API.DESTINATION_ADDRESS_ERROR: The destination address '{{ address }}' is erroneous
API.PEER_LIST_ERROR: Could not get list of peers

CONTACTS_PAGE.ADD_CONTACT_TEXT: Click on the button below to add a contact
CONTACTS_PAGE.CONTACT_EXISTS_ADDRESS: There is already a contact with the address '{{ address }}'!
CONTACTS_PAGE.CONTACT_NOT_EXISTS_ADDRESS: A contact with the address '{{ address }}' doesn't exist!
CONTACTS_PAGE.CONTACT_EXISTS_NAME: There is already a contact with the name '{{ name }}'!
CONTACTS_PAGE.OVERWRITE_CONTACT: There is already a contact named '{{ name }}' with this address. Do you want to overwrite it's name with '{{ newName }}'?

DELEGATES_PAGE.NOTE_COST_TEXT: Note that the cost of registering the delegate is
DELEGATES_PAGE.UNVOTE_CURRENT_DELEGATE: You already have a delegate, do you want to unvote {{ delegate }} first?
DELEGATES_PAGE.WARNING_SELECT_WALLET_FIRST: You need to select a wallet first to enable the voting process

INTRO_PAGE.TEXT_1: We provide all the tools you need to manage your ARK tokens, anytime, anywhere, worldwide!
INTRO_PAGE.TEXT_2: All your sensitive data is securely stored using PBKDF2 algorithm and AES-256 encryption protected by your PIN Code
INTRO_PAGE.TEXT_3: Swipe between profiles and wallets, check your balances, send and receive funds and much more

NETWORKS_PAGE.CHOOSE_ONE: Choose one of the network types
NETWORKS_PAGE.INTERNET_DESCONNECTED: Unable to connect to the Internet!

PASSPHRASE_TEST.INFO: Please type the required words from your passphrase to validate the wallet creation.
PASSPHRASE_TEST.WRONG_WORD: The typed word is not correct

PIN_CODE.WRONG_PIN_MANY_TIMES: You entered a wrong PIN too many times!
PIN_CODE.WAIT_TO_TRY: Please wait {{ time }} and try again
PIN_CODE.LOGIN_ERROR: There was a problem signing in with your PIN
PIN_CODE.PIN_CREATED_ERROR_TEXT: There was a problem creating your PIN
PIN_CODE.PIN_UPDATED_ERROR_TEXT: There was a problem updating your PIN
PIN_CODE.TYPE_PIN_ENCRYPT_PASSPHRASE: Type your PIN to encrypt passphrase
PIN_CODE.TYPE_PIN_SIGN_TRANSACTION: Type your PIN to sign transaction

PROFILES_PAGE.ADD_PROFILE_TEXT: Click on the button below to create a profile
PROFILES_PAGE.DELETE_NOT_EMPTY: You cannot delete a Profile that has 1 or more Wallets

QR_CODE.INVALID_QR_ERROR: There was a problem scanning a QR Code
QR_CODE.INVALID_QRCODE: This QR Code does not have a valid address or passphrase
QR_CODE.PERMISSION_PERMANENTLY_DENIED: QR Camera permanently denied. Go to your Device Settings to change.
QR_CODE.PROBLEM_TEXT: There was a problem scanning a QR Code

SETTINGS_PAGE.CLEAR_DATA_TEXT: All your data, including created profiles, wallets and contacts will be removed from the app and reset to default.
SETTINGS_PAGE.NOT_AVAILABLE_WATCH_ONLY: Not available for watch only address

TRANSACTIONS_PAGE.CREATE_TRANSACTION_ERROR: Could not create transaction. Check internet connectivity
TRANSACTIONS_PAGE.ENCRYPT_SAVE_SECOND_PASSPHRASE: Do you want to encrypt and save your second passphrase?
TRANSACTIONS_PAGE.QRCODE_COPY: Tap on address to copy it to clipboard or click on icon to share QR code.
TRANSACTIONS_PAGE.SECOND_PASSPHRASE_NOT_ENTERED: The second passphrase has not been entered

WALLETS_PAGE.ADD_WALLET_TEXT: To import or create wallet click on the button below
WALLETS_PAGE.ALERT_SUCCESSFULLY_ENCRYPTED_SECOND_PASS: The second passphrase was successfully encrypted
WALLETS_PAGE.BACKUP_ACCOUNT: IMPORTANT! Backup this 'secret passphrase' securely, without these words you can not restore your wallet or send transactions and ALL KAPU TOKENS WILL BE LOST.
WALLETS_PAGE.BACKUP_PASSPHRASE: Backup this passphrase securely, without these words you can not restore your wallet.
WALLETS_PAGE.BACKUP_SECOND_PASSPHRASE: Backup this second passphrase securely, without these words you can not move your funds.
WALLETS_PAGE.BACKUP_SECOND_PASSPHRASE_SECURELY_RETYPE: You can edit for a password of your choice. Remember to backup safely, you will need to re-type for validation.
WALLETS_PAGE.IMPORT_INVALID_ADDRESS: This address can not be imported into this profile
WALLETS_PAGE.LABEL: Label
WALLETS_PAGE.TYPE_PASSPHRASE_OR_ADDRESS: or type your | secret passphrase | or your | address | manually.
WALLETS_PAGE.PASSPHRASE_NOT_MATCH: The passphrase entered does not match the one you just got.
WALLETS_PAGE.PASSPHRASE_NOT_BELONG_TO_ADDRESS: The entered passphrase doesn't belong to the address '{{ address }}'!
WALLETS_PAGE.REMOVE_WALLET_TEXT: Your account will be removed. Make sure you have backed up, you will need the original passphrase to restore.
WALLETS_PAGE.SCAN_QRCODE_TEXT: Import your address or passphrase using QR Code, just point and scan!
